title: Fix admin login UI error messaging to match backend invalid-password vs service-unavailable

requirements.summary: Ensure admin login displays the exact invalid-password message only for explicit invalid-password responses, and shows a service-unavailable message for backend/candid/method-mismatch errors.
acceptanceCriteria: When the backend returns invalid-password, the admin login card displays exactly: "Invalid password. Please try again."
When the backend is unavailable or the method is missing/mismatched, the admin login card displays an English service-unavailable message (not the invalid-password message).

file_operations.description: Adjust admin login error classification so that only an explicit AdminLoginResult.invalidPassword results in throwing the exact message "Invalid password. Please try again."; for backend/candid/method-mismatch/network/unknown errors, throw a service-unavailable-style English message instead (and do not fall back to invalid-password).

Update AdminLoginCard error handling so it does not default to the invalid-password message when an error lacks a message; instead default to a service-unavailable-style English message and continue to display exactly the error message surfaced by useAdminSession.
